title: Allamanda cathartica (Linn.) Leaf Extracts-Encapsulated Phytoemulsions: Formulation, Characterization and In vitro-In vivo Biological Evaluations

Allamanda cathartica Linn. (A. cathartica L.) belongs to Apocynaceae family and is reported with various pharmacological activities. The present study aims to extract and formulate A. cathartica leaf extract-based emulsion,...
